ygData.subject: Re: bard mail delivery quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone else been doing the mail delivery quest?  When I deliver mail from Kelethin to Freeport it doesn t work, but going the other way (Freeport to
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone else been doing the mail delivery quest? When I deliver mail from
Kelethin to Freeport it doesn't work, but going the other way (Freeport to
Kelethin) it works fine. Here is what I am doing. Idia in Kelethin gives me
a mail pouch and tells me to take it to Felisity Starbright in Freeport. I do
that, but nothing happens. Is this a bug? Does it happen to everyone, or
just me? Am I doing something wrong?

Lanye
Wood Elf Bard
Fennin Ro
